name: Pile of Bullets
description:
A Pile of Bullets is all you have left to drive an invading force off your planet for good. Blast your way through 3 levels on your way to the heart of the enemy operation. There's no limit to how far you'll go in making them pay for coming here.

With 3 unique songs for each level and a bunch of retro sound effects provided by Scott Kirkland. His content really makes the game pop and provides good audio feedback. For the download to the soundtrack for this game, click here.

How to play:

WASD - Move player

Left Mouse click - Fire Machine Gun (infinite)

Right Mouse click - Use shield (timed recharge)

Middle Mouse click - Reload

SPACE - Fire Missile (consumable)

ALT Controls

ARROW Keys -  Move Player

Q - Fire Machine Gun (infinite)

E - Use shield (timed recharge)

R - Reload

SPACE - Fire Missile (consumable)

TIPS - Don't forget to use your shield! It blocks all bullets, but nothing else! And tanks suck :D

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS - Simply download and unzip the folder, then run PileofBullets.exe (Windows version only)
